summary: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.
cast: Michael Shannon|Willem Dafoe|Chloë Sevigny|Udo Kier|Michael Peña|Grace Zabriskie|Brad Dourif|Irma P. Hall|Loretta Devine|Candice Coke|Gabriel Pimentel|Braden Lynch|James C. Stone|Wendy Savage|Diana Sparta|Andres Torres|Branca Chapman|Joseph Ramos|Don Dolezal|Keith Lucas|Ken Impellizeri|Dave Bautista|Darby Darrow|Jerome Joaquin|Tony Lessa|Anthony Morasco|Timothy Peterson|Brad Pickett|Jason Scott|Steve Spurlock|Robert Rude|David Speck|Mark Willhelm|Matthew Zdunich|Mark Zdunich|Brady Abbott|Eric Bassett|Herbert Golder|Teresa Hardisty|Lena Herzog|James Lacey|Ernst Reijseger|Stephen Tompkins|Frank C. title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
